name: start_shipping_email_template_tool
description: Generate a plan summary for the user to understand the requirements of the email template and coordinate with the cto_tool to create the project for the user.

template_name.description: The name of the email template to be created

template_purpose.description: The purpose of the email template, such as newsletter, promotional, transactional, etc.

template_description.description: A detailed description of the email template, including target audience, key message, and any specific requirements

content_sections.description: Main sections to be included in the email template, such as header, main content, call-to-action, footer, etc.

design_style.description: The desired visual style for the email template, such as minimalist, colorful, corporate, playful, etc.
